entry.title: WIND WARNING , Comox
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 9:24 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 7.4°C
Wind: SE 30 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning in the evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
